Subject: Re: [junit] Junit and JDK 1.4.2


Hi,

Working on JUnit on JDK 1.4.2 it gives certain warning about assert methods.
I know this method has been introduced from JDK1.4 onwards.
Should they affect my JUnit assertion in anyway?

Thanks

Ranjeet Sahay.


"J. B. Rainsberger" wrote:

> Karthikeyan Ramnath wrote:
>
> >
> > Hi, has anyone tried using JUnit on JDK 1.4.2? I get a strange problem that

> > The same code works fine on 1.4.1_x versions...
> > Eagerly awaiting some response.
>
> I don't understand what /your/ menus and other components have to do
> with JUnit. Can you be more concrete about your problem?
